channel.title: Formative on IB English - Antonio Kam
channel.description: Recent content in Formative on IB English - Antonio Kam

item.title: Paper 1 Formative - Year 13 Term 1
item.description: Summary + Self-reported Feedback When going for your examples/evidence, please be more specific Instead of just the boy's face showing helplessness, say how this works (for example, the boy's mouth is wide open with half-closed eyes - looks very weak cupped in his mother's eyes etc) Make sure to mention more on PAF/COP/COR at the start of the text and be more explicit when pointing these things out Instead of going for something on a global scale when analysing, analyse how it affects the text instead.
